collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (6 total Queries, 5 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `m_user`.*, `m_penerima`.`id` as `idpeg`, `m_penerima`.`kode` as `kodepeg`, `m_penerima`.`nip` as `nippeg`, `m_penerima`.`nama` as `namapeng`, `m_penerima`.`is_confirm` as `confpeg`, `m_penerima`.`is_aktif` as `akpeg` FROM `m_user` LEFT JOIN `m_penerima` ON `m_user`.`id` = `m_penerima`.`user_id` WHERE `m_user`.`is_confirm` = '1' AND `m_user`.`is_aktif` = '1' AND `m_user`.`kode` = 'Administrator' AND `m_user`.`deleted_at` IS NULL

queries.hover: This query was called more than once.
